``` ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column-screen} ::: {.column .col-v-center width="15%"} ::: ::: {.column .col-v-center width="70%"} ## Hotel Information {#hotel} ::: {.panel-tabset} ## Philadelphia Marriott Downtown The 2023 AP-LS Conference will be held at the [Philadelphia Marriott Downtown](https://www.marriott.com/en-us/hotels/phldt-philadelphia-marriott-downtown/overview/?scid=8e4624f4-e96a-4d68-b772-59df755b5c65&gclsrc=ds) > 1201 Market Street > Philadelphia, PA, USA, 19107 > (guest entrance at 1200 Filbert Street) ## Conference Rates Book a room through the AP-LS sponsored link for conference discount $209 USD per night* Rate not inclusive of final taxes/fees [{{< fa bell-concierge >}} Book a room]("https://book.passkey.com/gt/218524854?gtid=ebf7480702a2b34d863a79c09cb5f074"){.btn-action .btn .btn-primary role="button"} ::: ## Register to Attend {#register} Registration is now open! Early Bird registration rates available on or before January 31, 2023. Additional pricing information listed below. [{{< fa user-plus >}} Register Now]("https://book.passkey.com/gt/218524854?gtid=ebf7480702a2b34d863a79c09cb5f074"){.btn-action .btn .btn-primary role="button"} https://apls.memberclicks.net/2023_conf_registration ```{=html}
